item.title: Hi, I'm Aidan
item.description: I’m entering my final year of the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign where I study computer science and statistics. Currently I’m a software engineer intern at Twitch in San Francisco, working on data infrastructure. During the fall, I will be studying abroad in Ireland at University College Dublin. I plan on graduating in either December 2022 or May 2023 (TBD). I’m currently looking for new-grad software engineer roles in nearly any location throughout the United States.
item.content:
I’m entering my final year of the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign where I study computer science and statistics. Currently I’m a software engineer intern at Twitch in San Francisco, working on data infrastructure. During the fall, I will be studying abroad in Ireland at University College Dublin. I plan on graduating in either December 2022 or May 2023 (TBD).

I’m currently looking for new-grad software engineer roles in nearly any location throughout the United States. As well as doing research during the school year at UIUC and the National Center for Supercomputing Applications (NCSA), I’ve done software engineering internships at the following companies:

  • Twitch: Data Platform
  • Google: YouTube Video Infrastructure
  • Amazon: AWS Panorama
  • AARP: Rewards & Walk Audit

I recently bought a camera and started taking a lot of pictures with it. I’m pretty bad with it right now, but I’ll upload the lucky few shots that look nice here. I also have done some projects for fun, and I’ve written about them in the projects section.

Feel free to check out the contact section if you’d like to get in touch.
